changes.title: rmail(8) and uucpd(8) moved to ports
changes.summary: /bin/rmail and uucpd(8) have been removed from the base system and added to the ports tree. As a result, the old binaries and manual pages should be removed:
changes.footnote: Users of these programs should install the rmail and uucpd packages instead.

changes.title: tcpwrappers removed
changes.summary: libwrap and tcpd have been removed. The leftover remnants must be purged. The entries in /etc/host.{allow,deny} can be converted into filtering rules in /etc/pf.conf.
